INFOGRAPHIC: Meaningful Use & the Electronic Health Record Storage Boom
National Health IT Week has come and gone. VMTurbo congratulates Wade W. for watching our Mary Washington Healthcare Webcast <http://vmturbo.com/vmturbo-webcast-mary-washington-healthcare/?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=nhitweek&utm_content=092214> and winning a LEGO© Batman©™ Tumbler set!
